abstract: Amazon says it is fixing the Kindle’s computerized-voice feature, which had trouble with “Barack Obama.”
snippet: Amazon says it is fixing the Kindle’s computerized-voice feature, which had trouble with “Barack Obama.”
lead_paragraph: The Amazon Kindle, an electronic reader, has been lavished with praise by hopeful newspaper and book executives who say they believe it has the potential to do for newspapers and books what the iPod did for music.

headline.main: The President’s Name Trips Up a Would-Be Voice of the News
headline.print_headline: The President’s Name Trips Up A Would-Be Voice of the News
